https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/551.features:
Hi! 

We have a large, gorgeous, pet-friendly 3rd floor studio with a private huge sunny deck and a beautiful view of the bay for sublet for May and June. Our dates are flexible so please email and let us know if you are interested in just one month or both months. 

There is a ton of light inside this unit, thanks to a lot of windows and a sun roof! We are also happy to share our projector where you can watch TV/movies on a large projected screen on the wall. The couch is also a pull-out sofa bed should you need to accommodate extra guests. The kitchen is fully functional, recently remodeled with granite counter. As a bonus, there is also an indoor jacuzzi that accommodates 2-4 people! There is also dedicated parking space in the driveway for 1-2 cars, in addition to street parking. There is a washer and dryer in the unit. And the rent includes all utilities and Internet. 

What we love about this place is also the location. It's just a 10-min walk from Ashby BART. We are a couple blocks from Nomad Coffee, Jumping Java, Starry Plough, Le Pena, etc, and about 10-min walk from Berkeley Bowl and Bushrod Park. We love being in North Oakland because we get easy access to the best of Berkeley and Oakland.

We are a couple going on an extended adventure travel in May and June. And we would love to share our space with someone who appreciates this unique studio. Please email us sharing a bit about yourselves, and what dates you are interested. If this post is live, that means the sublet is still available.

Thanks!
Chloe

https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/550.features:
Oak Walk Apartments!

Great spacious 3 bedroom 2 bath apartment with lots of natural light and excellent use of floor space, hardwood bamboo floors throughout the apartment, with carpets in the bedrooms. You'll have one assigned parking in the garage for free, access to the gym 24/7 and there is a bike room.

Emeryville's walk-able neighborhood and urban living that has become a popular living destination over the past decade. Pocket parks, Arizmendi, Peets, Public Market, and fine dining are all within a few-minute stroll from OakWalk. Urban entertainment at Bay Street, cafes, shopping at East Bay Bridge Center, and Emeryville's retail shopping provide the everyday requirements for avoiding the use of the car.

Convenient location with close proximity to shopping areas, eateries and close by running/walking/cycling trails along the bay. Transportation is just outside the door: AC Transit to downtown San Francisco, the Muni and FREE local Emery Go Round shuttle bus to the BART and shopping locations throughout Emeryville.

The location is on 2020 Kittredge St, Berkeley. The property is professionally managed by Library Gardens. The place is right next to Downtown Berkeley Bart Station, and Target, Walgreens, Starbucks, Bank of America and many many restaurants.

- You can get a room divider to ensure privacy

- Parking garage available at $135/month

Email me if you're interested with questions, a little bit background information and move-in date.


Thanks!

https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/550.features:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.


Office Hours
Monday 9am - 6pm
Tuesday 9am - 6pm
Wednesday 9am - 6pm
Thursday 9am - 6pm
Friday 9am - 6pm
Saturday 10am - 5pm
Sunday 10am - 5pm

3015 SAN PABLO AVE, Berkeley, CA 94702

Contact us

OPEN SUNDAY 3-4 PM

1720 Spruce is Spanish-style house that has been converted into 4 apartments. It is one block from campus. 

The apartment for lease is a 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit. The living room easily holds a full living room set-up as well as plenty of room for a desk, bookshelves and a dining table. It opens onto a private patio.

The kitchen is fully equipped with a stove, fridge and abundant cupboard and counter space. It has large windows for light and ventilation.

The bedroom can accommodate 2 twin beds or a king-sized bed. It also has two built-in closets. 

There is a coin laundry in the building and parking (subject to availability) at extra cost. 

A 1-year lease is required. Absolutely no smoking or pets.

https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/550.features:
http://rentwork.co

STOP relying on postings by landlords and brokers whose livelihood depends on you renting an apartment from them - regardless of whether that particular apartment is the right fit for you. STOP waiting for apartment listings to get posted for the world to see before making your move.

START working directly with current tenants to identify the right apartment before the world knows it's available. START getting honest, reliable and relevant information from the person in the best position to give it - the person currently living in the apartment you're considering making your home.

By signing up (only name and email required), you will be invited to the launch of Rentwork, a network of renters who are both leaving and looking for apartments. We are a community of givers and takers. You share your current apartment so someone else can benefit. And vice versa.

At Rentwork, we are renters ourselves and recognize the stress, frustration and headaches involved in looking for a new apartment. Join us as we begin the journey of reinventing how apartments are rented.

http://rentwork.co
https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/550.title: A New Way to Search: Work with Vacating Tenants

Recently renovated 3 bedroom and 1 bathroom for rent! This is a downstairs unit on 28th and Market in a 17 unit complex. This is one of many units that has been renovated on the property as part of a full overhaul of the complex and grounds. 

The unit is within 2 miles of downtown/uptown Oakland, 19th st. BART, Whole Foods, Lake Merritt and the Bay Bridge, perfect for professionals in Oakland or San Francisco. Enjoy a quick bike ride to Brown Sugar Kitchen, Trouble Coffee or even Target! If you drive, the unit includes a parking space, though there is never a shortage of street parking.

https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/550.features:
OPEN SUNDAY 3-4 PM

1720 Spruce is Spanish-style house that has been converted into 4 apartments. It is one block from campus. 

The apartment for rent is an unusually large upstairs studio on two levels. The living area easily holds two twin beds as well as plenty of room for desks, bookshelves and a dining table. 

The kitchen is fully equipped with a stove, fridge and abundant cupboard and counter space. It has large windows for light and ventilation and it even has a small view of the bay.

The apartment also has a long entry hallway that can accommodate bookshelves and a reading area. 

We provide some furnishings, such as bed, desk, chair, etc. However, please note that the furniture in the photos is representative only.

There is a coin laundry in the building. Parking - subject to availability - at extra cost. 

Available June 1. A 1-year lease is required. Absolutely no smoking or pets.

https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/550.features:
Here at Oak Walk Apartments!

Great spacious 2 bedroom 2.5 bath apartment with lots of natural light and excellent use of floor space, hardwood bamboo floors throughout the apartment, with carpets in the bedrooms.

Emeryville's walk-able neighborhood and urban living that has become a popular living destination over the past decade. Pocket parks, Arizmendi, Peets, Public Market, and fine dining are all within a few-minute stroll from OakWalk. Urban entertainment at Bay Street, cafes, shopping at East Bay Bridge Center, and Emeryville's retail shopping provide the everyday requirements for avoiding the use of the car.

Convenient location with close proximity to shopping areas, eateries and close by running/walking/cycling trails along the bay. Transportation is just outside the door: AC Transit to downtown San Francisco, the Muni and FREE local Emery Go Round shuttle bus to the BART and shopping locations throughout Emeryville.

https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/551.features:
This listing is one of the many scam apartment listings, claiming to rent property they own, while living out of town. It's the same story, different details every time. 
*Never fill out or return rental applications like the one in this email.*
If a listing seems too good or affordable to be true, it's probably one of these scams. 

Hello,

Thanks for the response to my advert. I'm George Anderson, owner of the apartment you are inquiring for rent. My apartment located on 2533 Hillegass Ave
Berkeley, CA 94704 is perfect with good transportation link and is available as soon as you are ready. I live there with my wife and child but had to move a few weeks ago to New Mexico on a missionary trip which we won't be returning from in a long while. I need you to be able fit into my apartment in our absence. My apartment is available for rent at $1200 per month which covers utilities and appliances and is available for a short or long term lease, whichever is required. My apartment is fully furnished & can be refurnished to your taste if you so please as there is an extra room which can be made into a store, or a second bedroom if you need an extra room. We left behind facilities which is included in the rent per month, the kitchen is fully equipped with all cooking utensils. Refrigerator/Freezer, Oven/Microwave, Dishwasher, Washing Machine, Dryer, Cable, TV, Internet, Central Heating, Stereo, Air Conditioning, Parking and more.

NOTE: I can only send you pictures of the interior of the apartment as I'm not around to show it to you in person plus you can only drive by and see the apartment from the outside as I'm with the keys and document for security purposes, if you are really interested in renting my apartment, I want you to get back to me with answers to application questions so I can email you pictures of the interiors and proceed with you renting my place as soon as I confirm your interest with the application filled. I would've loved to send the keys to someone who lives around but due to not living in the area long enough, I don't have anybody there right now to give them to which is another reason why I took them along with me since we're also new to the city. After all is finalized, the keys will be sent to the address you will be providing in the application below;
https://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/apa/551.title: *SCAM* 1 Bedr 4 blocks from UC Berkeley Gated secure remodeled
